titleStmt.title: The declaration of the Right Honourable Henry Earle of Cvmberland lord lievtenant generall of His Majesties forces in York-shire and of the nobility, gentry and others His Majesties subjects now assembled at Yorke for His Majesties service and the defence of this city and county.
titleStmt.author: Cumberland, Henry Clifford, Earl of, 1591-1643.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
